cSignalValue Class Reference

#include <clistener.h>

Inheritance diagram for cSignalValue:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A (simtime_t, double) pair, for emitting a signal value to be recorded into an output vector with a timestamp different from the current simulation time.

Public Member Functions

virtual simtime_t getSignalTime (simsignal_t)
virtual double getSignalValue (simsignal_t)

Member Function Documentation

virtual simtime_t cSignalValue::getSignalTime ( simsignal_t  signalID  )  [inline, virtual]

Allows the signal value to be recorded with a timestamp different from the current simulation time.

The default implementation just returns the current simulation time.

Reimplemented from cISignalValue.

virtual double cSignalValue::getSignalValue ( simsignal_t  signalID  )  [inline, virtual]

The signal value to be recorded.

The signalID argument allows the same class to support multiple signals.

Implements cISignalValue.
